name: The Hex
description: In a creaky old tavern, in a forgotten corner of the video-game universe, a storm is raging. An anonymous caller suggests that there is a murder plot. Six video game protagonists are the only plausible suspects...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
